rule.name: ARRNAME_REF
rule.description: check if an OI_ARRAY table matches the ARRNAME keyword

rule.name: ARRNAME_UNIQ
rule.description: check if a single OI_ARRAY table corresponds to the ARRNAME keyword

rule.name: FILE_EXIST
rule.description: check if the file exist

rule.name: FILE_LOAD
rule.description: check if the OIFITS file is loaded properly (IO error)

rule.name: INSNAME_REF
rule.description: check if an OI_WAVELENGTH table matches the INSNAME keyword

rule.name: INSNAME_UNIQ
rule.description: check if a single OI_WAVELENGTH table corresponds to the INSNAME keyword

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_DIM
rule.description: check if the dimension of column values >= 1

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_ERR_FIX
rule.description: fix the UNFLAGGED *ERR column invalid values (negative values set to NaN)

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_FORMAT
rule.description: check if the column format matches the expected format (data type and dimensions)

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_MANDATORY
rule.description: check if the required column is present

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_NBROWS
rule.description: check if the column length matches the expected number of rows

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_UNIT
rule.description: check if the column unit matches the expected unit

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_UNIT_EXIST
rule.description: check if the column unit exists

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_VAL_ACCEPTED_INT
rule.description: check if column values match the 'accepted' values (integer)

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_VAL_ACCEPTED_STR
rule.description: check if column values match the 'accepted' values (string)

rule.name: GENERIC_COL_VAL_POSITIVE
rule.description: check if column values are finite and positive

rule.name: GENERIC_DATE_OBS_RANGE
rule.description: check if the DATE_OBS value is within 'normal' range (1933 - 2150)

rule.name: GENERIC_DATE_OBS_STANDARD
rule.description: check if the DATE_OBS keyword is in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

rule.name: GENERIC_KEYWORD_FORMAT
rule.description: check if the keyword format matches the expected format (data type)

rule.name: GENERIC_KEYWORD_MANDATORY
rule.description: check if the required keyword is present

rule.name: GENERIC_KEYWORD_VAL_ACCEPTED_INT
rule.description: check if the keyword value matches the 'accepted' values (integer)

rule.name: GENERIC_KEYWORD_VAL_ACCEPTED_STR
rule.description: check if the keyword value matches the 'accepted' values (string)

rule.name: GENERIC_MJD_RANGE
rule.description: check if the MJD value is within 'normal' range (1933 - 2150)

rule.name: GENERIC_OIREV_FIX
rule.description: Fix the OI_REV keyword when the table is not in the proper OIFITS version

rule.name: GENERIC_STA_INDEX_UNIQ
rule.description: check duplicated indexes inside each STA_INDEX column values (data table)

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_ARRNAME
rule.description: check the ARRNAME keyword has a not null or empty value

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_STA_NAME
rule.description: check if the STA_NAME column values have a not null or empty value

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_STA_NAME_UNIQ
rule.description: check duplicated values in the STA_NAME column of the OI_ARRAY table

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_STA_INDEX_MIN
rule.description: check if the STA_INDEX values >= 1

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_STA_INDEX_UNIQ
rule.description: check duplicated indexes in the STA_INDEX column of the OI_ARRAY table

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_XYZ
rule.description: check if the ARRAY_XYZ keyword values corresponds to a proper coordinate on earth

rule.name: OI_ARRAY_XYZ_FIX
rule.description: fix the ARRAY_XYZ keyword values (to VLTI or CHARA according to the ARRNAME keyword) when the ARRAY_XYZ keyword values are incorrect

rule.name: OI_TARGET_COORD
rule.description: check if the TARGET RA and DEC values are not 0.0

rule.name: OI_TARGET_COORD_EXIST
rule.description: check if the TARGET RA or DEC value is not undefined

rule.name: OI_TARGET_TARGET
rule.description: check if the TARGET column values have a not null or empty value

rule.name: OI_TARGET_TARGET_EXIST
rule.description: check if the OI_TARGET table has at least one target

rule.name: OI_TARGET_TARGET_UNIQ
rule.description: check duplicated values in the TARGET column of the OI_TARGET table

rule.name: OI_TARGET_TARGETID_MIN
rule.description: check if the TARGET_ID values >= 1

rule.name: OI_TARGET_TARGETID_UNIQ
rule.description: check duplicated indexes in the TARGET_ID column of the OI_TARGET table

rule.name: OI_WAVELENGTH_EFF_WAVE
rule.description: check the EFF_WAVE column values are within range [0.1E-6 ... 20.0E-6]

rule.name: OI_WAVELENGTH_INSNAME
rule.description: check the INSNAME keyword has a not null or empty value

rule.name: OIFITS_OIDATA
rule.description: check if at least one data table exists in the OIFITS file

rule.name: OIFITS_OI_TARGET_EXIST
rule.description: check if only one OI_TARGET table exists in the OIFITS file

rule.name: OIFITS_OI_WAVELENGTH_EXIST
rule.description: check if at least one OI_WAVELENGTH table exists in the OIFITS file

rule.name: OIFITS_TABLE_NOT_V2
rule.description: check if any OIFITS 2 specific table (OI_CORR, OI_INSPOL or OI_FLUX) is present in an OIFITS 1 file

rule.name: UNKNOWN_COLUMN
rule.description: check if the column belongs to the OIFITS standard and version

rule.name: UNKNOWN_TABLE
rule.description: check if the table belongs to the OIFITS standard and version

keyword.name: OI_REVN
keyword.description: revision number of the table definition

column.name: RA_ERR
column.description: error in RA at mean equinox

column.name: DEC_ERR
column.description: error in DEC at mean equinox

column.name: PMRA_ERR
column.description: error of proper motion in RA

column.name: PMDEC_ERR
column.description: error of proper motion in DEC

keyword.name: OI_REVN
keyword.description: revision number of the table definition

column.name: STAXYZ
column.description: station coordinates relative to array center

keyword.name: OI_REVN
keyword.description: revision number of the table definition

keyword.name: OI_REVN
keyword.description: revision number of the table definition

column.name: TARGET_ID
column.description: target number as index into OI_TARGET table

column.name: MJD
column.description: Modified Julian Day (start date of observation)

column.name: STA_INDEX
column.description: station numbers contributing to the data

keyword.name: OI_REVN
keyword.description: revision number of the table definition

column.name: TARGET_ID
column.description: target number as index into OI_TARGET table

column.name: MJD
column.description: Modified Julian Day (start date of observation)

column.name: STA_INDEX
column.description: station numbers contributing to the data

keyword.name: OI_REVN
keyword.description: revision number of the table definition

column.name: TARGET_ID
column.description: target number as index into OI_TARGET table

column.name: MJD
column.description: Modified Julian Day (start date of observation)

column.name: U1COORD
column.description: U coordinate of baseline AB of the triangle

column.name: V1COORD
column.description: V coordinate of baseline AB of the triangle

column.name: U2COORD
column.description: U coordinate of baseline BC of the triangle

column.name: V2COORD
column.description: V coordinate of baseline BC of the triangle

column.name: STA_INDEX
column.description: station numbers contributing to the data
